subject: [Radiance-general] BDTF
body:
I will create BDTFs of different curtains and screens during the next weeks. Can you please point me to emails in the digest or papers from the Radiance workshops that show me how to bring BDTFs into a Radiance trans2 or other material description?

Many thanks

Martin Moeck
